en.today: The Gemini moon connects with Mercury, Saturn, the sun, and Chiron this morning, darling Aries, pulling your mind in multiple directions. Practice restraint while navigating these cosmic tides, giving yourself time to thoroughly strategize and think through ideas before making a move. Just be mindful not to overthink, especially if too many opposing opinions start to throw you off. When in doubt, step back to consider what works best for you without jeopardizing your relationships. Meanwhile, Venus and Pluto form a soft connection, setting the scene for instant connections when you are vulnerable and willing to put yourself out there.

en.today: Much focus is directed toward your relationships, dearest Leo, as the Gemini moon aspects Mercury, Saturn, the sun, and Chiron. You'll crave positivity and chemistry within your romantic and platonic connections, making it easier to move away from those who bring you down. Now is also a good time to address unhealthy social dynamics, tearing down any hierarchies that have become cliquish or toxic. Meanwhile, Venus and Pluto share a sweet aspect, bringing transformative vibes to matters of the heart. Dip your toe into intimate waters if you've been hoping to develop something serious with that special someone.

en.today: Welcome solitude and healthy boundaries today, dearest Taurus, as the Gemini moon aspects Mercury, Saturn, the sun, and Chiron. You could become disenchanted by specific dynamics within your social sphere, and pulling back can help you reclaim peace of mind. Focusing on your professional aspirations will act as a welcome distraction, and your patience may pay off when it comes to actualizing long-term dreams. Meanwhile, Venus, your planetary ruler, aspects transformative Pluto. Harness these vibes by allowing your behavioral patterns to evolve and mature as you set your sights on new heights, finding refinement in this process.

en.today: There will be much to accomplish and many opportunities to shine, dearest Gemini, as the moon continues its journey through your sign. Supportive aspects with Mercury, the sun, and Chiron make it easier to self-promote and lean on faith, helping you expand beyond your wildest dreams. However, a harsh square with Saturn cautions against pushing the envelope too far, especially when contesting with those who have more experience or are in a position of authority. Meanwhile, Venus and Pluto share a sweet connection, encouraging you to find deeper meaning within your social sphere by breaching philosophical topics.
